channel.title: Reward help
channel.description: Ok when i pray at alter i get a bone, instead of that i want it to reward them with like a santa hat how do i change that..And also when people hit the doors and hey bales and such i want them to get more xp instead of like 1000 xp i want them to get like 150000 how do i change that. and i want npc what they say to be diff colors not just yellow...Please help Thank you

item.title: Reward help
item.dc:creator: @javis javis
item.description:
@javis wrote:

alright heres a tut to change what it says when you gain a skill lvl which is basically the same thing and you can also you’se it to change what it says when you gain xp

http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,138082.msg1332241.html

Read full topic

item.title: Reward help
item.dc:creator: @javis javis
item.description:
@javis wrote:

to change the colors of what the npc’s say i think you have to add something like @red@ befor what they say and for the xp just search for dummy in your client.java and change the xp amount i will go find you a tut on this in a min

Read full topic
